revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.globalscaletechnologies.com/p-54-dreamplug-devkit.aspx |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = GlobalScale |model = DreamPlug |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = V9R1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = 003-DS2001 |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = plug computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6281; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5 (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L1606EM2I-12G; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = MicroSD |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = SanDisk;; |flash2size = 4 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY5PS1G831CFP-S6; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1318; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = F0:AD:4E |oui = 00:24:23
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2011.06;02334-g8f495d9-dirty; |stockos = Linux;2.6.33.7;Debian 5;
|exp_if_types = SD Card, microSD, eSATA 2.0, USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = 1 |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.25 |pwr_conn = NEMA 1-15P
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J8 |jtag = yes,, 8-pin header,, populated,, J15
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 2.1+EDR, SPDIF out, AV in/out, RTC w/ battery backup, |addchip = USB 2.0 Interface Flash Card Reader Controller;Genesys;GL836;;1; ,,, USB 2.0 High Speed 4-Port Hub Controller;JFD;FE1.1s;;1; ,,, USB Audio I/O Controller;C-Media Electronics;CM108;;1; ,,, 2A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Feeling Technology;FP6163;;4; |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = nosoup4u |defaultssid = dream-UAP-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = Debian,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 159 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0053GBB5Y |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-GH381 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8688; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Dream_Plug_V9R1" and "GLOBALSCALE" is silkscreened on the main board.
